name: Adding an array as a new element in another array
instruction:
Create the function `addArray` that should accept two arrays `arr1` and `arr2` containing mixed types of values.

Add the array `arr2` as the last element in the array `arr1`.

The function should return the modified array `arr1`.

Example of adding one array as an element to another array:

```javascript
const array1 = [1, 2, 3];
const array2 = [4, 5, 6];

// add array2 as a new element at the end of array1
array1.push(array2);

console.log(array1);    // [1, 2, 3, [4, 5, 6]]
console.log(array1[3]); // [4, 5, 6]
```

Examples of function execution:

```javascript
addArray([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6]);         // [1, 2, 3, [4, 5, 6]]
addArray([10], [false, true, 0, 'ed']); // [10, [false, true, 0, 'ed']]
addArray([], [false, 5, -6, 'd']);      // [[false, 5, -6, 'd']]
addArray([1, 2, 3], []);                // [1, 2, 3, []]
addArray([], []);                       // [[]]
```
